options.description: Selects the scan mode.

options.description: Number of bits per sample.
options.title: Bit Depth

options.description: Selects the halftone.
options.title: Halftoning

options.description: Selects the dropout.
options.title: Dropout

options.description: Selects the method to change the brightness of the acquired image.
options.title: Brightness Method

options.description: Controls the brightness of the acquired image.
options.title: Brightness

options.description: Controls the contrast of the acquired image.
options.title: Contrast

options.description: Selects the gamma correction value.
options.title: Gamma Correction

options.description: Sets the color correction table for the selected output device.
options.title: Color correction

options.description: Sets the resolution of the scanned image.
options.title: Resolution

options.description: Sets the horizontal resolution of the scanned image.
options.title: Horizontal Resolution

options.description: Sets the vertical resolution of the scanned image.
options.title: Vertical Resolution

options.description: Sets the minimum brightness to get a white pixel.
options.title: Threshold

options.description: Mirror the image.
options.title: Mirror image

options.description: Determines the speed at which the scan proceeds.
options.title: Scan speed

options.description: Display short resolution list
options.title: Short resolution list

options.description: Defines the zoom factor the scanner will use
options.title: Zoom

options.description: Gamma-correction table for the red band.
options.title: Red intensity

options.description: Gamma-correction table for the green band.
options.title: Green intensity

options.description: Gamma-correction table for the blue band.
options.title: Blue intensity

options.description: After sending the scan command, wait until the button on the scanner is pressed to actually start the scan process.
options.title: Wait for Button

options.description: Indicates whether a button on the scanner has been pressed.
options.title: Monitor Button

options.description: Time between queries when waiting for device state changes.
options.title: Polling Time

options.description: Indicates whether the scanner needs to poll.
options.title: Needs Polling

options.description: Matrix multiplication of RGB values.
options.title: Color Correction Coefficients

options.description: Controls red level
options.title: Red

options.description: Adds to red based on green level
options.title: Shift Green to Red

options.description: Adds to red based on blue level
options.title: Shift Blue to Red

options.description: Adds to green based on red level
options.title: Shift Red to Green

options.description: Controls green level
options.title: Green

options.description: Adds to green based on blue level
options.title: Shift Blue to Green

options.description: Adds to blue based on red level
options.title: Shift Red to Blue

options.description: Adds to blue based on green level
options.title: Shift Green to Blue

options.description: Control blue level
options.title: Blue

options.description: Request a preview-quality scan.
options.title: Preview

options.description: Select the area to scan based on common media sizes.
options.title: Scan Area

options.description: Top-left x position of scan area.
options.title: Top Left X

options.description: Top-left y position of scan area.
options.title: Top Left Y

options.description: Bottom-right x position of scan area.
options.title: Bottom Right X

options.description: Bottom-right y position of scan area.
options.title: Bottom Right Y

options.description: Select an area to scan based on well-known media sizes. (DEPRECATED)
options.title: Quick format

options.description: Selects the scan source.
options.title: Scan Source

options.description: Eject document after scanning
options.title: Auto eject

options.description: Sets the focus position to either the glass or 2.5mm above the glass
options.title: Focus Position

options.description: Select bay to scan
options.title: Bay

options.description: Eject the sheet in the ADF
options.title: Eject

options.description: Selects the ADF mode (simplex/duplex)
options.title: ADF Mode

options.description: Activates document size auto-detection.  The scan area will be set to match the detected document size.
options.title: Auto-detect document size

options.description: Indicates whether the current scan area settings are valid.
options.title: Scan Area Is Valid

options.description: Skips per sheet device setup for faster throughput.
options.title: ADF Auto Scan

options.description: Sets the sensitivity with which multi-sheet page feeds are detected and reported as errors.
options.title: Double Feed Detection Sensitivity

options.description: Ugly kludge to provide additional status message strings to a frontend.
options.title: Extended SANE Status

options.description: Indicates whether the device's ADF duplex mode, if available, scans in the same direction for the front and back.
options.title: ADF Duplex Direction Matches

options.description: Rotate image so it appears upright.
options.title: Deskew

options.description: Determines empty margins in the scanned image and removes them.  This normally reduces the image to the size of the original document but may remove more.
options.title: Trim image to paper size

options.description: Performs color matching to make sure that the document's color tones are scanned correctly.
options.title: Calibrate

options.description: Cleans the scanners reading section.
options.title: Clean
